xPower.OptionalItemsText3:
A Ricks College alumnus, Richard J. Clifford received his MFA in Theatre Design and Technology from BYU in 2002. Prior to joining the faculty at BYU-Idaho (in 2004) he worked as a free-lance designer for stage, television and film. He has appeared as an actor in dozens of stage productions, films and television episodes (imdb page). He taught as an adjunct faculty at BYU in Provo and as a full time faculty at Salt Lake Community College.

He has served as department chair since 2009
